sn12.47:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati. Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ … pe … ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12.47:2: "Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, sabbamatthī"ti? "‘Sabbamatthī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayameko anto".
sn12.47:4: Evaṁ vutte, jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama … pe … pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan"ti.
